name: The Original Money Collection By Mr. $

metadata.name: Original Mr. $ #1
metadata.description:
An Original Collection by Mr. $

Original Mr. $ #1

Perceptual Hash: eaadec003a559a9fc45669fb954396bcb417685f855285ab94441a97d053697e

The Original Money Collection is a collection of artworks that leverage fluorescent paints to emphasize artistic symbolism. DayGlo pencils and spray paints were utilized to create 21 physical canvas artworks. The artworks were digitalized, delicately curated, and matched to a custom smart contract with unique metadata; each piece was then minted as a 1 of 1 ERC721 Non-Fungible Token. The first owner of each NFT also owns the physical canvas. The shipping of the physical canvas to the buyer is facilitated by PottersNFT Corporation claim via electronic mail : operations@pottersnft.io.
